description: Program Director affluent in managing large multi track programs with experience in strong agile practices, PMO focused on end to end delivery of transformation project. Strategic Leadership: Develop and execute a comprehensive program strategy for unified desktop integrating Salesforce Service Cloud, Cisco, and Uniphore solutions for transforming our business solution. Project Management: Lead end-to-end project management efforts, ensuring adherence to timelines, budgets, and quality standards. Stakeholder Management: Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders, including executive leadership, department heads, technology partners, and third-party vendors, to align project objectives with business goals. Risk Management: Identify potential risks and develop mitigation strategies to minimize disruptions to project timelines and deliverables. Implement effective change management processes to support organizational adoption of new technologies and processes. Oversee quality assurance processes to ensure that solutions meet functional and performance requirements. Reporting and Documentation: Prepare and present regular progress reports, documentation, and presentations to stakeholders and leadership. 20+ years experience in Technology industry and or PMO. Insurance industry experience is a must.
